TLINE.TDLINE: This document outlines the process for whitelisting ABAP packages that
are permitted for processing by Genie. This whitelisting is crucial for
ensuring compliance with legal requirements regarding the use of
generative AI (GenAI) with SAP code.
Current Restrictions:
Due to the lack of explicit clarification from SAP regarding the use of
standard SAP code with GenAI models for explainability purposes, only
custom packages owned by your organization should be whitelisted. This
restriction is in place to mitigate potential legal risks.
Future Considerations:
If and when SAP permits the use of standard SAP code with GenAI models,
the whitelisting process will be updated. At that time, all custom
packages should be removed from the whitelist table, and a single entry
with the value * should be added. This will whitelist all packages,
including standard SAP packages.
User Responsibility:
Any user who whitelists standard SAP packages or uses the * wildcard
without proper legal authorization assumes full responsibility for any
resulting legal implications. It is imperative to only whitelist
packages in accordance with current legal guidelines and company policy.
Consult with the legal team if you have any questions regarding
permissible use.
